title: Bannisters Grand Opening: Barefoot Luxury in Port Stephens
description: Escape to the ultimate luxury getaway destination, the brand-new Bannisters hotel in Soldiers Point. Located just two-and-a-half hours from Sydney and a 30-minute drive from Newcastle airport, it’s the perfect spot for a relaxing long weekend by the beach. Included in your escape is a daily continental buffet breakfast at celebrity chef Rick Stein's on-site restaurant, a gourmet two-course open-menu lunch, served poolside at the Terrace Bar, a welcome cocktail and more.
offer_address: Bannisters Port Stephens, 147, Soldiers Point Rd, Soldiers Point NSW 2317

title: Experience Boutique Waterfront Luxury at Bannisters Port Stephens
description: Escape to one of Australia’s leading boutique hotels, the brand-new Bannisters Port Stephens, only two-and-a-half hours from Sydney. Boasting stunning ocean views, a sun-drenched infinity pool and a Rick Stein flagship restaurant, this boutique haven is the ideal location for the ultimate luxury getaway. Your escape includes daily continental buffet breakfast at celebrity chef Rick Stein's on-site restaurant, an AU$100 hotel credit to spend on spa treatments or dining experiences, a daily replenished mini bar with soft drinks and snacks and a glass of sparkling on arrival.
offer_address: Bannisters Port Stephens, 147, Soldiers Point Rd, Soldiers Point NSW 2317
